member.name: DHPUBKEY_VER3
member.summary: The DHPUBKEY_VER3 structure contains information specific to the particular public key contained in the key BLOB.

member.name: DHPUBKEY_VER3.magic
member.summary: This must always be set to 0x33484400, the ASCII encoding of "DH3".

member.name: DHPUBKEY_VER3.bitlenP
member.summary: Number of bits in the DH key BLOB's prime, P.

member.name: DHPUBKEY_VER3.bitlenQ
member.summary: Number of bits in the DH key BLOB's prime, Q. If Q is not available, then this value should be 0.

member.name: DHPUBKEY_VER3.bitlenJ
member.summary: Number of bits in the DH key BLOB's prime, J. If J is not in the BLOB, then this value should be 0.

member.name: DHPUBKEY_VER3.DSSSeed
member.summary: Seed structure holding the seed and counter values used to generate the primes Q and P. If values in the structure are not available, then the counter element of the structure should be 0xFFFFFFFF.
